name: 2024 10th International Conference on e-Society, e-Learning and e-Technologies
content: Publication: The accepted paper will be included into ICSLT 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1679-9), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
organizers: University of Portsmouth and Music Academy 'Studio Musica', Italy
